Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires the estimated cost of mandated expenditures and appropriations within the body of the bill
Summary: Requires the estimated cost of mandated expenditures and appropriations within the body of the bill.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring the estimated cost of mandated expenditures and appropriations within the body of the bill
